posts.post_content:
I'm looking for uncommon backs of T206s featuring the nine Baltimore players.  Any condition will do.  Specifically looking for:

- Adkins (Cycle)
- Cassidy (Sweet Cap 350/25)
- Dessau (Sweet Cap 25 or Cycle)
- Dunn (Cycle, American Beauty, or Tolstoi)
- Jackson (Cycle or EPDG)
- Poland (Sweet Cap 25 or American Beauty)


Thanks!  Dave

Picked a couple off in the last two months.  Does anyone have any of these available in any condition?

Thanks,

Dave
